subject: XHTMLUnit 0.9 released
msgSnippet: XHTMLUnit 0.9 has been released. XHTMLUnit builds on JUnit and XMLUnit in order to provide testing and validation of generated (and static) XHTML code.
messageBody:
XHTMLUnit 0.9 has been released.

XHTMLUnit builds on JUnit and XMLUnit in order to provide testing and
validation of generated (and static) XHTML code.

Changes:
- HTML4 compatibility mode
- XML version tag supported
- Introduction paper as DOC and PDF

http://sourceforge.net/projects/xhtmlunit

Johannes
